name: Poképoke
description:
A small game made for a small pokemon community ~
(from the blog maybe-eevee.tumblr.com)

"I commend your enthusiasm, but there are literally better ways to get 10 pokedollars," said Calder as he's emphatically dragged into one of Maybe's harebrained schemes.

(It should work fine with safari, firefox, and chrome. Opera might have some sound issues as it uses an old version of chromium. Also there's like an iframe so you might need to click on the small window itself and press C to start.)
